hibernate-mapping.query: select new fledgerdto( f.AccountSignature,f.CurrencyCode,f.SourceBranchCode ) from PFMORM00023 as f where f.AccountNo = :accountNo and f.Active = true
update PFMORM00023 f set f.PrintLineNo = :lineNo, f.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, f.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where f.AccountNo = :accountNo and f.Active = true
select new fledgerdto( fLedger.PrintLineNo ) from PFMORM00023 as fLedger where fLedger.AccountNo = :accountNo and fLedger.Active = true
update PFMORM00023 f set f.FixedBalance = :fBal, f.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, f.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where f.AccountNo = :accountNo and f.Active = true
update PFMORM00023 f set f.FixedBalance = f.FixedBalance +:fbal, f.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, f.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where f.AccountNo = :accountNo and f.Active = true
update PFMORM00023 f set f.FixedBalance = f.FixedBalance -:fbal, f.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, f.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where f.AccountNo = :accountNo and f.Active = true
select new fledgerdto( fLedger.FixedBalance ) from PFMORM00023 as fLedger where fLedger.AccountNo = :accountNo and fLedger.Active = true

select new fledgerdto( fLedger.AccountNo, fLedger.FixedBalance, fLedger.AccountSignature, fLedger.LinkLimit, fLedger.DebitAccountNo, fLedger.PrintLineNo, fLedger.SourceBranchCode, fLedger.CurrencyCode, fLedger.Date_Time ) from PFMORM00023 as fLedger where fLedger.AccountNo = :accountNo and fLedger.Active = true
select new fledgerdto( fLedger.AccountNo, fLedger.FixedBalance ) from PFMORM00023 as fLedger where fLedger.Active = true and fLedger.SourceBranchCode = :SourceBranchCode
select new fledgerdto (c.CurrencyCode,sum(c.FixedBalance)) from PFMORM00023 as c where c.SourceBranchCode = :sourcebr and c.Active = true group by c.CurrencyCode
